info.name: TRWTF is My #000 Obsession
info.description:
Restyles The Daily WTF to be very very dark.
Ideal for OLED screens and people who like darkness as much as I do.
info.additionalInfo:
Version -0.30
Made sidebar text visible again



Version -0.33
Changed some background colors to make the page darker and more in line with the default styling.



Version -0.35
Made some code formatting more legible.



Version -0.38
Styled Archive button on main page




Version -0.39
Covered the use of pre blocks to display code.




Version -0.4
Tags and panels on fora are now nice and dark too.




Version -0.45
In-article headers now show up properly.




Version -0.5
Deblued blockquotes and comments. Neutral colors for all backgrounds now.




Version -0.6
Styled blockquotes, which now fit in with the rest of the page and get brighter with deeper nesting.




Version -0.7
Styled the right bars that show up on hover on articles on main page.




Version -0.75
Updated code block colors for legibility.


Version -0.8
Styled fora!



Version -1.0
Forums are as of yet unstyled, sidebar is kind of ugly.
Everything else looks pretty good.
